content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: campfire
inventory=[{"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 63, "index": 10}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 59, "index": 26}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "infested_mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 30}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I need to craft a campfire. To do so, I need to place 3 sticks in a column with a coal in the middle. To make a coal, I need to smelt the coal_ore at slot 42 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 42 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
